title: FinFlow
description: AI-powered financial management app with smart budgeting, expense tracking, and investment portfolio analytics. Features real-time sync across devices and intelligent spending insights.

title: FoodieHub
description: Restaurant discovery and food delivery platform with AR menu preview, real-time order tracking, and personalized recommendations based on dietary preferences.
projectIcon: <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' class='bg-icon-svg' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='1' d='M16 11V7a4 4 0 00-8 0v4M5 9h14l1 12H4L5 9z' /></svg>

title: FitTrack Pro
description: Comprehensive fitness tracking app with AI-powered workout plans, nutrition guidance, and social challenges. Integrates with all major wearables and health platforms.
projectIcon: <svg viewBox='0 0 24 24' fill='none' class='bg-icon-svg' stroke='currentColor'><path stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-width='1' d='M8 12h.01M12 12h.01M16 12h.01M21 12c0 4.418-4.03 8-9 8a9.863 9.863 0 01-4.255-.949L3 20l1.395-3.72C3.512 15.042 3 13.574 3 12c0-4.418 4.03-8 9-8s9 3.582 9 8z' /></svg>

title: TravelMate
description: Smart travel companion with offline maps, itinerary planning, expense splitting, and real-time translation. Perfect for solo travelers and group adventures.
